docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -eux;     url="https://static.rust-lang.org/rustup/archive/1.21.1/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/rustup-init";     wget "$url";     echo "0c86d467982bdf5c4b8d844bf8c3f7fc602cc4ac30b29262b8941d6d8b363d7e *rustup-init" | sha256sum -c -;     chmod +x rustup-init;     ./rustup-init -y --no-modify-path --profile minimal --default-toolchain $RUST_VERSION;     rm rustup-init;     chmod -R a+w $RUSTUP_HOME $CARGO_HOME;     rustup --version;     cargo --version;     rustc --version;
docker.raw: RUN set -eux;     url="https://static.rust-lang.org/rustup/archive/1.21.1/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/rustup-init";     wget "$url";     echo "0c86d467982bdf5c4b8d844bf8c3f7fc602cc4ac30b29262b8941d6d8b363d7e *rustup-init" | sha256sum -c -;     chmod +x rustup-init;     ./rustup-init -y --no-modify-path --profile minimal --default-toolchain $RUST_VERSION;     rm rustup-init;     chmod -R a+w $RUSTUP_HOME $CARGO_HOME;     rustup --version;     cargo --version;     rustc --version;
